text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump @HHSGov $100k is NOTHING compared to the nearly 100k LIVES LOST TO #CORONAVIRUS due-in-part to HIS negligence! That’s just over $1 per HUMAN. As usual, all show & no heart. 🙄😡
